snippet.title: Mortuum Gameplay Level 1
snippet.description:
Game info http://www.mobygames.com/game/win3x/mortuum

In short: This is a 1995 Windows 3.11 video game. It is basically a pass-time game which is really addictive and fun :)

Played on DosBox which emulates Windows 3.11.
I have tried various methods of running the game, and this one is by far the best when it comes to emulation.
Use this guide to install windows 3.11 on dosbox 
http://vogons.zetafleet.com/viewtopic.php?t=9405
